text: Hauteville-Lompnes is a former commune. It is found in the region Auvergne- Rhône-Alpes in the Ain department in the east of France. It is about 20 km east of Ambérieu-en-Bugey and 38 km southeast of Bourg-en-Bresse. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the new commune of Plateau d'Hauteville.Arrêté préfectoral , 12 December 2018 == References == Category:Former communes in Ain
title: Hauteville-Lompnes
